params.taskDescription:
Find the measure of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mn>1</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\measuredangle 1</annotation></semantics></math> and state the reason for your solution.
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>149</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle 1 = {149^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math> by supplementary angles with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>31</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>.</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\measuredangle {31^ \circ }.</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription:
Find the measure of  <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mn>5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\measuredangle 5</annotation></semantics></math> and state the reason for your solution.
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>149</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle 5 = {149^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math> by corresponding angles with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mn>1.</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\measuredangle 1.</annotation></semantics></math>
